creditline: Gift of funds from the Groves Foundation
description: Bureau de Dame, Jean Gaspard Feilt, kingwood, oak, marquetry, gilded bronze mounts, French XVIII listed on cat. card as Louis XV Lady's Writ- ing Desk; Dims 38-1/4 x 41-1/2 x 23-1/2'; 6/88: a-desk; b-j-drawers; k-l lower drawers; key
markings:
Stamped [G. Feilt] twice and [JME] once.  
1917 loan sitcker from the Victoria and Albert Museum.
title: Lady’s writing desk
